name: FirebaseRxSwiftExtensions
summary: Untangle your messy Firebase code with RxSwift Extension Methods
description:
Firebase is a block or closure based API, unfortunately doing anything robust takes a lot of nesting.
 This makes your code get out hand very fast. RxSwift 2.0.0-beta.3 or higher is required. Swift 2 and XCode 7.1 are required.
